Headline: Temporary Northbound #22 Clark Reroute near Dearborn/Van Buren
ShortDescription: Northbound 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Dearborn/Van Buren.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Ida B Wells, State, Adams, Dearborn, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Dearborn/Van Buren.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Westbound Reroute near Diversey/Central Park
ShortDescription: Westbound 76 Diversey buses are temp. rerouted via Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, Pulaski & Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, Pulaski, then resume normal route on Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Central Park.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 35th/Rhodes
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity at 35th/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

##35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity at 35th/Rhodes.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, King Drive, 33rd Place, then will take recovery time.

Westbound buses will operate via 33rd Place, King Drive, 35th, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 79th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 79th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
